quote:
It's important to practice good hygiene
at least if you wanna run with my team
title: If You Must

quote:
You gotta wash your ass,
if you must
You gotta wash your hair,
if you must
You gotta brush your teeth,
if you must
Or else you'll be funky
title: If You Must
I Can't Do Nuttin' For Ya, Man

quote:
I go so deep on your ass, you'll be submerged
Like you need to do in water
'cause you smell like a turd
title: If You Must

quote:
Wanna cap? Get some courage, your feet smell lurid
Go look it up, and while you're at it, get a cup
And squeeze the sweat out your sweatshirt and drink it or gargle
title: If You Must

quote:
check, yourself
Respect yourself
And wash your mothafuckin' body 'fore your sweatshirt melt
title: If You Must

quote:
check, yourself
Respect yourself
And wash your mothafuckin' body 'fore your sweatshirt melt
title: If You Must

quote:
The thing I'm talking about is an essence
A foreign fragrance with a presence
That you can't see with the naked eye
But to the nose it's a nuisance
title: The Dragon

quote:
There are ways of preventing this
Check your hygiene and your dentist
You might think I'm messing, but this is a lesson
Godliness is cleanliness
title: The Dragon

quote:
You're sitting there baffled and puzzled
Whatever you have, you wish you was muzzled
But if you want a clue,
between me and you
It could be the beverage you guzzle
title: The Dragon

quote:
So I'ma end it off like this
Before you give somebody a kiss
For the one you adore,
check them before
You get a crazy whiff
title: The Dragon
